NAME key

DLG SPR_0
"""
{sequence
  - This place has changed a lot in my time.
  - I sold flowers here when I was young
  - I still bring flowers here to remind me of the past.
  - Take these... though there's a young man I'd like to give flowers to.
}{
  - {item "cross"} == 1 ?
    Oh my! I've been looking for a sign.
  - {item "ice cream"} == 1 ?
    Is this dairy?! I'm lactose intolerant. >:(
}
"""

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_1
"""
{sequence
  - Meeeow
  - Mee e ee eow Me eeow Meeow Me e eow
  - Mee eow Meow Meow Mee e eow
  - Mee e eow Me eeow Me eow Me ee eow Mee e ee eeow
  - Me e ee eow Mee ee eeow Me ee eow
  - Me e eow Me e e eow Me eow Mee eow Mee e ee eeow
  - Me e ee eow Me e eeow Me ee eow
}{
  - {item "ice cream"} == 1 ?
    Thanks for the ice cream chump.
  - {item "flowers"} == 1 ?
    Blegh! Any fool knows flowers are poisonous to cats.
}
"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
{sequence
  - Отче наш, Иже еси на небесех...
  - Мир вам
  - Peace be with you stranger.
  - Take this cross, and if you see someone, pray with her.
}{
  - {item "light"} == 1 ?
    I've seen the light!!
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_3
"""
{sequence
  - Can I help you?
  - Your car looks like it's out of gas, do you need to see a mechanic?
  - Here's the key to the back. See if there's a gas can.
}{
  - {item "flowers"} == 1 ?
    Oh my! From a secret admirer! I must find her.
  - {item "light"} == 1 ?
    No!! You'll set the whole place on fire.
}
"""

DLG SPR_4
"""
{sequence
  - What a day for ice cream, right!
  - Have an ice cream cone
  - I'd offer more flavors but I can't get into the storeroom.
}
"""

VAR a
42
